diet_plan:
1. Greek Yogurt & Berries:
   - 1 cup Greek yogurt
   - 1/2 cup mixed berries
   - Drizzle of honey

2. Overnight Oats:
   - 1/2 cup rolled oats
   - 1/2 cup almond milk
   - 1 tbsp chia seeds
   - 1/2 banana, sliced

3. Smoothie:
   - 1 cup spinach
   - 1 banana
   - 1/2 cup frozen berries
   - 1 cup almond milk

4. Avocado Toast:
   - 1 slice whole-grain bread
   - 1/2 avocado, mashed
   - Sprinkle of chili flakes

5. Boiled Eggs & Veggies:
   - 2 boiled eggs
   - Carrot and cucumber sticks

6. Cottage Cheese & Fruit:
   - 1/2 cup cottage cheese
   - 1/2 cup pineapple chunks

7. Peanut Butter Toast:
   - 1 slice whole-grain bread
   - 1 tbsp peanut butter
   - 1/2 banana, sliced

1. Chicken Salad:
   - 1 cup mixed greens
   - 100g grilled chicken breast
   - Cherry tomatoes
   - Cucumber slices
   - Olive oil & lemon dressing

2. Quinoa Bowl:
   - 1/2 cup cooked quinoa
   - 1/2 cup black beans
   - 1/2 avocado, diced
   - Salsa

3. Turkey Wrap:
   - Whole-grain tortilla
   - 100g sliced turkey breast
   - Lettuce, tomato, cucumber
   - Mustard

4. Tuna Salad:
   - 1 can tuna in water, drained
   - 1 tbsp light mayo
   - Celery & red onion, diced
   - Mixed greens

5. Vegetable Stir-Fry:
   - 1 cup mixed vegetables (bell peppers, broccoli, carrots)
   - 100g tofu or chicken
   - Soy sauce

6. Lentil Soup:
   - 1 cup lentil soup
   - 1 slice whole-grain bread

7. Egg Salad:
   - 2 boiled eggs
   - 1 tbsp light mayo
   - Lettuce, tomato, cucumber

1. Grilled Salmon:
   - 100g grilled salmon
   - Steamed broccoli
   - 1/2 cup brown rice

2. Chicken & Veggies:
   - 100g grilled chicken breast
   - Roasted vegetables (zucchini, bell peppers, carrots)

3. Stuffed Peppers:
   - Bell peppers stuffed with quinoa, black beans, and corn
   - Topped with a sprinkle of cheese

4. Shrimp Stir-Fry:
   - 100g shrimp
   - Mixed vegetables (snap peas, bell peppers, carrots)
   - Soy sauce

5. Beef & Broccoli:
   - 100g lean beef strips
   - Steamed broccoli
   - 1/2 cup brown rice

6. Vegetable Curry:
   - Mixed vegetables (cauliflower, peas, carrots)
   - 1/2 cup chickpeas
   - Light coconut milk curry sauce
   - 1/2 cup basmati rice

7. Turkey Meatballs:
   - 100g ground turkey meatballs
   - Zucchini noodles
   - Marinara sauce

1. Apple Slices with Almond Butter:
   - 1 apple
   - 1 tbsp almond butter

2. Carrot Sticks & Hummus:
   - 1 cup carrot sticks
   - 2 tbsp hummus

3. Mixed Nuts:
   - 1/4 cup mixed nuts

4. Cucumber Slices with Cottage Cheese:
   - 1/2 cucumber, sliced
   - 1/4 cup cottage cheese

5. Hard-Boiled Egg:
   - 1 hard-boiled egg

6. Rice Cakes with Avocado:
   - 2 rice cakes
   - 1/2 avocado, mashed

7. Greek Yogurt with Honey:
   - 1/2 cup Greek yogurt
   - Drizzle of honey
